title: The Gentlemen: The Complete Series
description: A Complete, Binge-worthy Series filled with action, romance, and a healthy dose of sass. This set contains all three best-selling titles: RED HANDED THIEVES' HONOR DAMNED SOULS From Book One: Forced to live with my ENEMIES. They think they OWN ME. But I own their HEARTS. Nico, Rush, and Beck are the three leaders of The Gentlemen. For my entire life, my family has been at war with their gang, splitting our city down the middle. Theyâ€™re Violent, Possessive, and Psychotic. When my sister is threatened, I have no choice but to turn to them. But to trust them is to risk it all.
author: Kate   King
